name: Classic Water Bottle
description: A sleek and durable glass water bottle with a secure screw cap. Perfect for everyday hydration while reducing plastic waste.

images.alt: Clear glass water bottle with blue cap
images.title: Classic Glass Water Bottle

customerReviews.name: Michael Johnson
customerReviews.review: Excellent quality bottle. No plastic taste and easy to clean.

name: Amber Medicine Bottle
description: Amber glass bottle with dropper cap, perfect for storing essential oils, tinctures, or light-sensitive medications. UV protection prevents degradation of contents.

images.alt: Amber glass medicine bottle with dropper
images.title: Amber Glass Medicine Bottle

shortDescription: 30ml amber glass bottle with medicine dropper.

customerReviews.name: Sarah Williams
customerReviews.review: Perfect size and the dropper works very precisely. Amber color provides good UV protection.

name: Vintage Milk Bottle
description: Retro-style glass milk bottle with wide mouth and optional metal cap. Perfect for serving milk, homemade beverages, or as a decorative piece.

customerReviews.name: Thomas Brown
customerReviews.review: Great quality and looks authentic. Only wish it came with the metal cap included.

name: Blue Cosmetic Bottle
description: Cobalt blue glass bottle with pump dispenser, ideal for lotions, serums, and other skincare products. The dark glass helps preserve sensitive formulations.

images.alt: Cobalt blue glass bottle with pump dispenser
images.title: Blue Glass Cosmetic Bottle

shortDescription: 100ml cobalt blue glass cosmetic bottle with pump.

customerReviews.name: Emily Parker
customerReviews.review: Beautiful bottle for my homemade face serum. Pump works smoothly but be careful not to overtighten it.

name: Green Wine Bottle
description: Standard green glass wine bottle with cork finish. Perfect for home winemaking, craft beverages, or upcycling projects.
shortDescription: Standard 750ml dark green glass wine bottle.

customerReviews.name: Robert Chen
customerReviews.review: Perfect bottles for my homemade wine. Good quality and thickness, corks fit well.

name: Square Decanter Bottle
description: Elegant square glass decanter bottle with glass stopper. Ideal for spirits, liqueurs, oils, or as a decorative accent piece.

images.alt: Square glass decanter bottle with stopper
images.title: Square Glass Decanter Bottle

shortDescription: 500ml square glass decanter bottle with stopper.

customerReviews.name: Olivia Martinez
customerReviews.review: Stunning bottle! The glass is thick and has a beautiful clarity. Perfect for my homemade limoncello.

name: Miniature Glass Bottle
description: Tiny glass bottle with cork stopper, perfect for crafts, wedding favors, message in a bottle gifts, or storing small quantities of special ingredients.

images.alt: Small clear glass bottle with cork
images.title: Miniature Cork Glass Bottle

shortDescription: 15ml miniature glass bottle with cork stopper.

customerReviews.name: Jessica Taylor
customerReviews.review: Cute little bottles! Perfect for the beach-themed wedding favors I'm making.

name: Frosted Spray Bottle
description: Elegant frosted glass bottle with fine mist sprayer. Ideal for room sprays, hair products, or aromatherapy blends. Provides UV protection while maintaining a sleek appearance.

images.alt: Frosted glass bottle with spray nozzle
images.title: Frosted Glass Spray Bottle

shortDescription: 100ml frosted glass spray bottle for misting.

customerReviews.name: Daniel Wilson
customerReviews.review: Good quality bottle and the sprayer works well. The frosted finish looks premium and hides fingerprints.

name: Apothecary Bottle
description: Vintage-inspired apothecary bottle with glass lid. Features an embossed design and wide mouth, perfect for bathroom storage, candy jars, or decorative use.

images.alt: Clear glass apothecary bottle with lid
images.title: Glass Apothecary Storage Bottle

shortDescription: 350ml clear glass apothecary bottle with lid.

customerReviews.name: Amanda Lee
customerReviews.review: Beautiful vintage-looking bottle! The glass is thick and the lid fits perfectly. Using it in my bathroom for cotton balls.
